videoJson.name: 1/4" Akai
videoJson.fact1: This format was initially only available in black-and-white, with color being introduced in 1974; color tapes were not backwards-compatible due to the systems running at different speeds
videoJson.fact2: This format was typically stored on 5" reels but larger 10.5" reels were later introduced
videoJson.fact3: This format was marketed for consumer use, intended for recording home movies
